member.name: M:VT_Interfaces.IJobStepFood.GetFinishWarnings(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: "Used to check for limits etc that are required to be viewed beofre closing a step, these are warnings so do not stop a step finishing"
member.returns: "datatable of messages, e.g. containing the following columns: Detail/Min/Max/Expected/Actual/Status"

member.name: M:VT_Interfaces.IJobStepFood.CheckIngredientIsVaild(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,System.Int64)
member.summary: "Used to check an ingredient meets criteria"
member.returns: "String which is a status or error message, should be set to OK if a criteria test is met"

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:VT_Interfaces.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
